title: Online Learning Network Design and Utilization: Formative Assessment-Based Mathematics Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning platforms and understanding of foundational mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: A course where pre-service teachers learn to build online interaction networks when designing mathematics curricula, conducted in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can design network structures for collaborative mathematical problem-solving in online environments.
Learners can revise the learning network design at least three times by analyzing formative assessment results.
Learners can utilize interactive tools (discussion boards, shared whiteboards, etc.) tailored to mathematics curriculum characteristics at least 80% of the time.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
